title: The Magic Fish
description: The book tells an intergenerational story of a mother and son struggling to relate to each otherâ€”the mother an immigrant to the United States who wants to make a home for her family in an unfamiliar country; the son trying to figure out the best way to come out to his parents. Through telling each other fairy tales, they're able to find common ground.
author: Trung Le Nguyen
